          "last_edited_time": 1551945684689,
          "parent_id": "2baeafa4-0a3a-41bc-9185-9f0f514b3dc6",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["border-style", [["c"]]],
              [" can also have the values "],
              ["none", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["hidden", [["c"]]],
              [". They have the same effect, except "],
              ["hidden", [["c"]]],
              [" works for border conflict resolution for "],
              ["<table>", [["c"]]],
              [" elements. In a "],
              ["<table>", [["c"]]],
              [" with multiple borders, "],
              ["none", [["c"]]],
              [
                " has the lowest priority (meaning in a conflict, the border would show), and "
              ],
              ["hidden", [["c"]]],
              [
                " has the highest priority (meaning in a conflict, the border would not show)."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 5
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
  }
}
